rows.label: tlk47500163_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My wife rests here. She passed away
quietly, in her sleep. That was years
ago now...

rows.label: tlk47500163_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I think it's wonderful that she was able
to live her entire life in the village she
was born.

rows.label: tlk47500163_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Nowadays, you've got all these wars
going on. You never know when we
might get wrapped up in it all...

rows.label: tlk47500163_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Rex? Don't waste your life in vain,
do you hear? For Correl,
and for your parents.
